00021 #include "Common/Compat.h"
00022 #include "DiscreteRandomGenerator.h"

00024 using namespace Hypertable;
00025 
00026 DiscreteRandomGenerator::DiscreteRandomGenerator()
00027   : m_u01(boost::mt19937()), m_seed(1), m_max_val(1024*1024*1024), m_cmf(0)
00028 {
00029   m_rng.seed((uint32_t)m_seed);
00030   m_u01 = boost::uniform_01<boost::mt19937>(m_rng);
00031 }
00032 
00033 
00034 uint64_t DiscreteRandomGenerator::get_sample()
00035 {
00036   if (m_cmf == 0) {
00037     m_cmf = new double [ m_max_val + 1 ];
00038     generate_cmf();
00039   }
00040 
00041   uint64_t upper = m_max_val;
00042   uint64_t lower = 0;
00043   uint64_t ii;
00044 
00045   double rand = m_u01();
00046 
00047   assert(rand >=0.0 && rand <= 1.0);
00048 
00049   // do a binary search through cmf to figure out which index in cmf
00050   // rand lies in. this will transform the uniform[0,1] distribution into
00051   // the distribution specified in m_cmf
00052   while(true) {
00053 
00054     assert(upper >= lower);
00055     ii = (upper + lower)/2;
00056     if (m_cmf[ii] >= rand) {
00057       if (ii == 0 || m_cmf[ii-1] <= rand)
00058         break;
00059       else {
00060         upper = ii - 1;
00061         continue;
00062       }
00063     }
00064     else {
00065       lower = ii + 1;
00066       continue;
00067     }
00068   }
00069 
00070   return ii;
00071 
00072 }
00073 
00074 void DiscreteRandomGenerator::generate_cmf()
00075 {
00076   uint64_t ii;
00077   double norm_const;
00078 
00079   m_cmf[0] = pmf(0);
00080   for (ii=1; ii < m_max_val+1 ;++ii) {
00081     m_cmf[ii] = m_cmf[ii-1] + pmf(ii);
00082   }
00083   norm_const = m_cmf[m_max_val];
00084   // renormalize cmf
00085   for (ii=0; ii < m_max_val+1 ;++ii) {
00086     m_cmf[ii] /= norm_const;
00087   }
00088 }
